programme.title: Space Channel's Chill
programme.desc: A journey through space and time to discover the truth in all things, and our connection and rhythm with the Cosmos Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movies: Without Warning
programme.desc: Sandy and Greg are teenagers who go camping, despite warnings not to, with their friends. They soon encounter aliens, who are using the area as a hunting ground. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movie : The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: An Alien lands in Washington D.C. and has a warning for all mankind. He tells the people of Earth that they must live peacefully or be destroyed as a danger to other planets. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel News Update: Starship, CSC and TSC
programme.desc: Space Channel News with continuing coverage of the SpaceX Starship program. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Social Space : Aliens off the coast of Malibu?
programme.desc: Did Elon really just acquire Twitter? Who will be America's Next Astronaut? All this and more, only on Social Space! Duration: 1800

programme.title: Space Channel Movie - Solar Destruction
programme.desc: A coronal mass ejection with Earth in the crosshairs. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Presents Cinespace
programme.desc: Space Channel Presents Cinespace, an partnership between The Houston Cinematic Arts Society and NASA. These are award winning movies that will definitely inspire. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Invisible Invaders
programme.desc: Invisible aliens from the Moon invade the Earth by occupying the bodies of the recently deceased. A scientist, his daughter and an army Major, try to fight them. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Asteroid News
programme.desc: Here's some of our asteroid news and other "info". Duration: 1800

programme.title: 2021 Cinepace Movies
programme.desc: A selection from the 2021 Cinespace Film Festival. Cinespace is a partnership between the Houston Cinema Arts Society and NASA. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Space Channel Movies- Its a dangerous universe!
programme.desc: The Boogies, SkyFighter and Caronte show that space is a dangerous place. Especially when it lands on the ground. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Shorts
programme.desc: In Cradle, Eade and her dad are on the return journey to earth when an explosion cripples the craft and seriously injures her father. In New Mars, a generation lives underground on Mars preparing to begin a new life as the colonists of a planet which is being terraformed into a new habitable world. Finally, Kaya Torres is circling a black hole in a pod. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Invisible Invaders
programme.desc: Invisible aliens from the Moon invade the Earth by occupying the bodies of the recently deceased. A scientist, his daughter and an army Major, try to fight them. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movie : Laserblast
programme.desc: A teenager stumbles upon an alien weapon. Which turns him into a grotesque killer. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Spooky Space Channel Shorts
programme.desc: A collection of Space Channel short films that will leave you breathless and running for an exit. Or just scratching your head. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Movies : Queen of Blood
programme.desc: In the year 1990 An alien species makes contact with Earth through radio transmission. An alien ship crash lands on Mars, and a rescue team is sent from Earth. Eventually a surviving female is located and brought on-board the Earth ship. Trouble. Duration: 7200
